question: Is downloading books free would be allowed in Islam?
answer:
QUESTION

There is a website www.ebooksclub.org which offers free ebooks. the downloads are totally free. I just wanted to know whether downloading books free would be allowed in Islam since i am not sure whether any rules are being broken.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

If the website offers you to download e books for free, then it will be permissible for you to do so. I have read through the Terms & Rules page, and it does not mention anything about the legality of downloading e books. However, after visiting the site, the only service I saw they were offering is reviews of books.

And Allah knows best 

Wassalam

Ml. Azeemuddin Ahmed
